001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.ConfigSource;
004import io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.PropertyConfig;
005import org.aeonbits.owner.Config;
006
007/**
008 * Configuration interface for UI automation settings.
009 *
010 * <p>This interface is used to define and retrieve configuration properties
011 * for the UI automation framework. It uses the {@link Config} library
012 * to load values from system properties or a properties file.
013 *
014 * <p>Properties are loaded from:
015 * <ul>
016 *     <li>System properties (e.g., `-Dbrowser.type=CHROME`)</li>
017 *     <li>Classpath properties file, dynamically determined by `${ui.config.file}.properties`</li>
018 * </ul>
019 *
020 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
021 */
022@ConfigSource("ui-config")
023@Config.LoadPolicy(Config.LoadType.MERGE)
024@Config.Sources({"system:properties", "classpath:${ui.config.file}.properties"})
025public interface UiConfig extends PropertyConfig {
026
027   /**
028    * Retrieves the browser type used for UI testing.
029    *
030    * <p>Default: "CHROME"
031    *
032    * @return The browser type (e.g., CHROME, FIREFOX, EDGE).
033    */
034   @DefaultValue("CHROME")
035   @Key("browser.type")
036   String browserType();
037
038   /**
039    * Retrieves the browser version.
040    *
041    * <p>Default: "" (empty string, meaning latest version will be used)
042    *
043    * @return The browser version (e.g., "114.0.5735.199").
044    */
045   @DefaultValue("")
046   @Key("browser.version")
047   String browserVersion();
048
049   /**
050    * Determines whether the browser should run in headless mode.
051    *
052    * <p>Default: false
053    *
054    * @return {@code true} if headless mode is enabled, otherwise {@code false}.
055    */
056   @DefaultValue("false")
057   @Key("headless")
058   boolean headless();
059
060   /**
061    * Retrieves the URL for a remote WebDriver instance.
062    *
063    * @return The Selenium Grid or remote WebDriver URL.
064    */
065   @DefaultValue("")
066   @Key("remote.driver.url")
067   String remoteDriverUrl();
068
069   /**
070    * Retrieves the default wait duration for element interactions.
071    *
072    * @return The wait duration in seconds.
073    */
074   @Key("wait.duration.in.seconds")
075   int waitDuration();
076
077   /**
078    * Retrieves the base package of the project for class scanning.
079    *
080    * @return The project's root package.
081    */
082   @Key("project.packages")
083   @Separator(";")
084   String[] projectPackages();
085
086   /**
087    * Retrieves the default type for input fields.
088    *
089    * @return The default input component type.
090    */
091   @Key("input.default.type")
092   String inputDefaultType();
093
094   /**
095    * Retrieves the default type for buttons.
096    *
097    * @return The default button component type.
098    */
099   @Key("button.default.type")
100   String buttonDefaultType();
101
102   /**
103    * Retrieves the default type for checkboxes.
104    *
105    * @return The default checkbox component type.
106    */
107   @Key("checkbox.default.type")
108   String checkboxDefaultType();
109
110   /**
111    * Retrieves the default type for toggle buttons.
112    *
113    * @return The default toggle component type.
114    */
115   @Key("toggle.default.type")
116   String toggleDefaultType();
117
118   /**
119    * Retrieves the default type for radio buttons.
120    *
121    * @return The default radio button component type.
122    */
123   @Key("radio.default.type")
124   String radioDefaultType();
125
126   /**
127    * Retrieves the default type for select (dropdown) components.
128    *
129    * @return The default select component type.
130    */
131   @Key("select.default.type")
132   String selectDefaultType();
133
134   /**
135    * Retrieves the default type for list components.
136    *
137    * @return The default list component type.
138    */
139   @Key("list.default.type")
140   String listDefaultType();
141
142   /**
143    * Retrieves the default type for loader/spinner components.
144    *
145    * @return The default loader component type.
146    */
147   @Key("loader.default.type")
148   String loaderDefaultType();
149
150   /**
151    * Retrieves the default type for link components.
152    *
153    * @return The default link component type.
154    */
155   @Key("link.default.type")
156   String linkDefaultType();
157
158   /**
159    * Retrieves the default type for alert components.
160    *
161    * @return The default alert component type.
162    */
163   @Key("alert.default.type")
164   String alertDefaultType();
165
166   /**
167    * Retrieves the default type for tab components.
168    *
169    * @return The default tab component type.
170    */
171   @Key("tab.default.type")
172   String tabDefaultType();
173
174   /**
175    * Retrieves the default type for modal components.
176    *
177    * @return The default modal component type.
178    */
179   @Key("modal.default.type")
180   String modalDefaultType();
181
182   /**
183    * Retrieves the default type for accordion components.
184    *
185    * @return The default accordion component type.
186    */
187   @Key("accordion.default.type")
188   String accordionDefaultType();
189
190   /**
191    * Retrieves the base URL for the UI application.
192    *
193    * <p>This URL is used as the root for all page navigation and resource loading
194    * within the UI automation framework.
195    *
196    * @return The configured base URL
197    */
198   @Key("ui.base.url")
199   String baseUrl();
200
201   /**
202    * Retrieves the default type for table components.
203    *
204    * @return The default table component type.
205    */
206   @Key("table.default.type")
207   String tableDefaultType();
208
209   /**
210    * Determines whether wrapped Selenium functions should be used.
211    *
212    * <p>Default: true
213    *
214    * @return {@code true} if wrapped Selenium functions should be used, otherwise {@code false}.
215    */
216   @DefaultValue("true")
217   @Key("use.wrap.selenium.function")
218   boolean useWrappedSeleniumFunctions();
219
220   /**
221    * Determines whether Shadow DOM elements should be used.
222    *
223    * <p>Default: false
224    *
225    * @return {@code true} if Shadow DOM elements should be used, otherwise {@code false}.
226    */
227   @DefaultValue("false")
228   @Key("use.shadow.root")
229   boolean useShadowRoot();
230
231}
